text: Love Henrik Samuel Antell (born 24 October 1980) is a Swedish-Finnish singer and artist. As a student he attended Adolf Fredrik's Music School in Stockholm. Antell is known as the frontman of the band Florence Valentin, and as a solo singer. Antell's parents were both from Finland. He grew up in Östermalm in central Stockholm but nowadays resides in Hägersten.Love Antell He was educated as an illustrator at Konstfack between 2001 and 2007, and he is inspired by Lars Hillersberg.Clarte.nu Between 2007 and 2011, Antell was a guitarist in the folk-rock group Perssons Pack. He participated in Mika Ronkainen's drama documentary film "Ingen riktig finne"; the film won first prize in the category Best Nordic Documentary at the Gothenburg Film Festival in 2013.Filmrecensioner – Inget riktigt djup As an artist, Love Antell has done the cover for author Lena Andersson's book "Duck City" and illustrated Michel Houellebecq's book "Plattform".Intervju – Love Antell Antell was one of the singers in the 2014 season of the TV4 series Så mycket bättre. ==Discography== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center;" |- ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Title ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Year ! scope="col" colspan="1"| Peak chart positions |- ! scope="col" style="width:3em;font-size:85%;"| SWE |- ! scope="row"| Gatorna tillhör oss | 2012 | — |- ! scope="row"| Hitsville Haninge Samlade Spår 2003–2014 | 2014 | — |- ! scope="row"| Barn av Amerika | 2015 | 30 |} ===Singles=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center;" |- ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Title ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Year ! scope="col" colspan="1"| Peak chart positions ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Album |- ! scope="col" style="width:3em;font-size:85%;"| SWE |- ! scope="row"| "Stjärna där" | 2012 | — | rowspan="2" |- ! scope="row"| "Underhåll oss" | 2014 | — |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish pop singers Category:Swedish rock singers Category:Swedish people of Finnish descent Category:Swedish-language singers Category:21st-century Swedish singers
